summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3945 for the improvement of Waters Avenue, from 57th Avenue South to Bangor Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing walks; grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 48122, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
